mapper.select:
/* codyClaimMapper.selectCodyClaimList */
SELECT T.CLM_NO, T.MEM_ACC_ID, T.MEM_ACC_NAME, TO_DATE(T.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM') AS CLM_MONTH, T.REQST_DT, 'MYR' AS CUR, T.TOT_AMT, T.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM (SELECT T1.CLM_NO, T1.MEM_ACC_ID, T2.MEM_ACC_NAME, T1.CLM_MONTH, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T4.REQST_DT, Nvl (T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, 'T') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE, Nvl (( CASE T4.APPV_PRCSS_STUS WHEN 'R' THEN 'Request' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Approve In-Progress' WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'J' THEN 'Rejected' END ), 'Temporary Save') AS APPV_PRCSS_STUS, T4.APPV_PRCSS_DT FROM FCM0019M T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T2 ON T1.MEM_ACC_ID = T2.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0004M T4 ON T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO = T4.APPV_PRCSS_NO WHERE CLM_TYPE = 'J7') T WHERE 1=1
AND T.CLM_MONTH = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMonth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM')
AND UPPER(T.MEM_ACC_ID) = UPPER(#{memAccId})
AND UPPER(T.CLM_NO) = UPPER(#{clmNo})
AND T.APPV_PRCSS_STUS_CODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY T.CLM_NO, T.CLM_MONTH, T.REQST_DT
/* codyClaimMapper.selectTaxCodeCodyClaimFlag */ SELECT TAX_CODE , INDUSTRY_CODE||' '||'('||TAX_NAME||')' AS TAX_NAME FROM FCM0007C WHERE CODY_CLM_FLAG = 'X'

/* codyClaimMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J7' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm')
/* codyClaimMapper.selectNextClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

/* codyClaimMapper.selectCodyClaimItems */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, ( CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE_NAME, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.EXP_GRP, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY T1.CLM_SEQ

/* codyClaimMapper.selectCodyClaimInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T4.MEM_ACC_NAME, T3.BANK_CODE, T4.BANK_NAME, T3.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T1.EXP_GRP, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T5.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T3.MEM_ACC_ID = T4.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T5 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* codyClaimMapper.selectCodyClaimItemGrp */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, T2.TAX_RATE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T3.CAR_MILAG_DT, T3.LOC_FROM, T3.LOC_TO, T3.CAR_MILAG, T3.CAR_MILAG_AMT, T3.TOLL_AMT, T3.PARKING_AMT, T3.PURPOSE, T1.EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0021D T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO AND T1.CLM_SEQ = T3.CLM_SEQ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLAM_UN = #{clamUn}

/* codyClaimMapper.selectAttachList */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
mapper.delete: /* codyClaimMapper.deleteCodyClaimExpItem */ DELETE FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
/* codyClaimMapper.deleteCodyClaimExpMileage */ DELETE FROM FCM0021D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
mapper.update: /* codyClaimMapper.updateCodyClaimExpTotAmt */ UPDATE FCM0019M SET TOT_AMT = #{allTotAmt} WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
mapper.select: /* codyClaimMapper.selectSchemaOfMemType */ SELECT SCHEM_ID SCHEM_ID, CASE WHEN MEM_TYPE = 2 THEN 'CODY' ELSE 'CT' END MEM_TYPE, RANGE_FROM RANGE_FROM, RANGE_TO RANGE_TO, MILEAGE_AMT MILEAGE_AMT, DEDUCT_FLAG DEDUCT_FLAG, MULTI_RATE MULTI_RATE, EXT_CHARG EXT_CHARG, TO_CHAR(PERIOD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_FROM, TO_CHAR(PERIOD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLY_TO, ( ( #{carMilag} - NVL(DEDUCT_FLAG, 0) ) * NVL(MULTI_RATE, 0) + NVL(EXT_CHARG, 0) + NVL( MILEAGE_AMT, 0) ) CAR_MILAG_AMT FROM SVC0033M WHERE 1 = 1 AND MEM_TYPE = #{memType} AND RANGE_FROM <= #{carMilag} AND RANGE_TO >= #{carMilag}
